pages.text: Every now and then you are lucky enough to have an enemy leave behind a single rare item.\The connection of [Clovers](book://resources/clover) and [Light Blue Pigment](book://general/pigment@light_blue) to luck you can increase those chances dramatically.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Higher chance to get rare loot drops, like [#](bb00bb)Iron Ingots[#]() from Zombies.\_May even increase your chances of getting the most valuable of drops?_\\Max Level: 3\Applicable to melee weapons.\Mutually exclusive with Looting.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Clovers' Favor by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading Clovers' Favor from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.\This price will quickly increase to more and more [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and experience for each additional level.
